name: Tatsunoko Mashup Costume Set
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

We've teamed up with the legendary Japanese anime company Tatsunoko Production to bring in 16 costumes from some of their most celebrated series to the world of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round! Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version. This set includes the following 16 costumes: ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Kasumi & Yatterman 2 ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Ayane & Cocona ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Hitomi & Tanpei ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Leifang & Junko ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Kokoro & Akubi ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Mila & Hutch ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Momiji & Majo ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Phase 4 & Yatterman 1 ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Marie Rose & Leopard ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Nyotengu & Doronjo ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Honoka & Komugi ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa & Tekkaman ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Hayate & Casshan ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Gen Fu & Genie ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Jann Lee & Hurricane Polimar ・Tatsunoko Mashup - Raidou & Gold Lightan *You must have the latest update installed before using this costume. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries. ©Tatsunoko Production ©Tatsunoko Production/KOMUGI R Committee © Tatsunoko Production/Yatterman Night Committee 2015
about_the_game:
We've teamed up with the legendary Japanese anime company Tatsunoko Production to bring in 16 costumes from some of their most celebrated series to the world of Dead or Alive 5 Last Round!

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

This set includes the following 16 costumes:
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Kasumi & Yatterman 2
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Ayane & Cocona
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Hitomi & Tanpei
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Leifang & Junko
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Kokoro & Akubi
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Mila & Hutch
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Momiji & Majo
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Phase 4 & Yatterman 1
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Marie Rose & Leopard
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Nyotengu & Doronjo
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Honoka & Komugi
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Ryu Hayabusa & Tekkaman
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Hayate & Casshan
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Gen Fu & Genie
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Jann Lee & Hurricane Polimar
・Tatsunoko Mashup - Raidou & Gold Lightan

*You must have the latest update installed before using this costume.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
